original: unfold power. rewrite Hu1. rewrite Hu. rewrite Hseq_u with (a:=u)(f:=fun i :nat => S(2*i)). rewrite const_u2_meet with (m:=l)(k:=2)(k':=4*l)(f:=fun i :nat => S i). - rewrite sum_power_binary_lt with (q:=l)(r:=r)(f:=fun i :nat => S i). simpl. reflexivity. - lia. - intros. lia. - intros. lia. - lia. - lia. - reflexivity.
